me1200ErpsMib.name: me1200ErpsMib

revisions.description: Renaming of ME1200ErpsControlCommand to ME1200ErpsControlCmd to avoid name clash.
Definition of type InterfaceIndex changed from Unsigned32 to Integer32 as it is used as index in some tables
Do no use Unsigned32 for indexes

me1200ErpsMib.contactinfo: Cisco Systems, Inc Customer Service Postal: 170 W Tasman Drive San Jose, CA 95134 USA Tel: +1 800 553-NETS E-mail: cs-me1200@cisco.com
me1200ErpsMib.description: Private MIB for Ethernet Ring Protection Switching, ERPS.

ME1200ErpsPort.name: ME1200ErpsPort
ME1200ErpsPort.description: Specifies a particular logical ring port.

ME1200ErpsRplMode.name: ME1200ErpsRplMode
ME1200ErpsRplMode.description: Specifies the Ring Protection Link mode. Use 'none' if port is neither RPL owner nor neighbour.

me1200ErpsCapabilitiesMaxGroups.name: me1200ErpsCapabilitiesMaxGroups
me1200ErpsCapabilitiesMaxGroups.description: Maximum number of configured ERPS groups.

me1200ErpsCapabilitiesMaxVlansPerGroup.name: me1200ErpsCapabilitiesMaxVlansPerGroup
me1200ErpsCapabilitiesMaxVlansPerGroup.description: Maximum number of protected VLANS per ERPS group.

me1200ErpsConfigTable.name: me1200ErpsConfigTable
me1200ErpsConfigTable.description: This is the ERPS group configuration table.

me1200ErpsConfigEntry.name: me1200ErpsConfigEntry
me1200ErpsConfigEntry.description: Each entry in this table represents an ERPS group.

me1200ErpsConfigGroupIndex.name: me1200ErpsConfigGroupIndex
me1200ErpsConfigGroupIndex.description: ERPS group index number. Valid range is (1..max groups). The maximum group number is platform-specific and can be retrieved from the ERPS capabilities.

me1200ErpsConfigRingType.name: me1200ErpsConfigRingType
me1200ErpsConfigRingType.description: Type of ring. Can only be set once for a ring instance.

me1200ErpsConfigPort0.name: me1200ErpsConfigPort0
me1200ErpsConfigPort0.description: ifindex of ring protection port 0. Can only be set once for a ring instance.

me1200ErpsConfigPort1.name: me1200ErpsConfigPort1
me1200ErpsConfigPort1.description: ifindex of ring protection Port 1. For interconnected sub-rings this value must be zero. Can only be set once for a ring instance.

me1200ErpsConfigInterconnectMajorRingGro.name: me1200ErpsConfigInterconnectMajorRingGroupIndex
me1200ErpsConfigInterconnectMajorRingGro.description: For sub-ring: zero = not interconnected; > zero = index of major ring group. For major ring: zero = not interconnected; > zero = is interconnected (i.e flag-like semantics). Can only be set once for a ring instance.

me1200ErpsConfigVirtualChannel.name: me1200ErpsConfigVirtualChannel
me1200ErpsConfigVirtualChannel.description: Whether to use a virtual channel. Can only be set once for a ring instance.

me1200ErpsConfigPort0SignalFailMepIndex.name: me1200ErpsConfigPort0SignalFailMepIndex
me1200ErpsConfigPort0SignalFailMepIndex.description: Index of SignalFail MEP for Port 0. Zero if not set. To clear an ERPS group's MEP association, set this to zero; it affects all MEP indices.

me1200ErpsConfigPort0ApsMepIndex.name: me1200ErpsConfigPort0ApsMepIndex
me1200ErpsConfigPort0ApsMepIndex.description: Index of APS MEP for Port 0. Zero if not set.

me1200ErpsConfigPort1SignalFailMepIndex.name: me1200ErpsConfigPort1SignalFailMepIndex
me1200ErpsConfigPort1SignalFailMepIndex.description: Index of SignalFail MEP for Port 1. Zero if not set. Must be zero for interconnected sub-rings.

me1200ErpsConfigPort1ApsMepIndex.name: me1200ErpsConfigPort1ApsMepIndex
me1200ErpsConfigPort1ApsMepIndex.description: Index of APS MEP for Port 1. Zero if not set. Must be zero for interconnected sub-rings with virtual channel.

me1200ErpsConfigHoldOffTime.name: me1200ErpsConfigHoldOffTime
me1200ErpsConfigHoldOffTime.description: Hold off time in ms. Value is rounded down to 100ms precision. Valid range is 0-10000 ms

me1200ErpsConfigWaitToRestoreTime.name: me1200ErpsConfigWaitToRestoreTime
me1200ErpsConfigWaitToRestoreTime.description: Wait-to-Restore time in ms. Valid range is 60000-720000 ms (1-12 minutes).

me1200ErpsConfigGuardTime.name: me1200ErpsConfigGuardTime
me1200ErpsConfigGuardTime.description: Guard time in ms. Valid range is 10-2000 ms.

me1200ErpsConfigRplPort.name: me1200ErpsConfigRplPort
me1200ErpsConfigRplPort.description: RPL port. Only valid if the ERPS group is RPL owner or neighbour.

me1200ErpsConfigTopologyChange.name: me1200ErpsConfigTopologyChange
me1200ErpsConfigTopologyChange.description: Whether to enable Topology Change propagation; only valid for an interconnected node.

me1200ErpsConfigProtectedVlans0Kto1K.name: me1200ErpsConfigProtectedVlans0Kto1K
me1200ErpsConfigProtectedVlans0Kto1K.description: First quarter of bit-array indicating whether a VLAN is protected by this ring instance ('1') or not ('0').

me1200ErpsConfigProtectedVlans1Kto2K.name: me1200ErpsConfigProtectedVlans1Kto2K
me1200ErpsConfigProtectedVlans1Kto2K.description: Second quarter of bit-array indicating whether a VLAN is protected by this ring instance ('1') or not ('0').

me1200ErpsConfigProtectedVlans2Kto3K.name: me1200ErpsConfigProtectedVlans2Kto3K
me1200ErpsConfigProtectedVlans2Kto3K.description: Third quarter of bit-array indicating whether a VLAN is protected by this ring instance ('1') or not ('0').

me1200ErpsConfigProtectedVlans3Kto4K.name: me1200ErpsConfigProtectedVlans3Kto4K
me1200ErpsConfigProtectedVlans3Kto4K.description: Fourth quarter of bit-array indicating whether a VLAN is protected by this ring instance ('1') or not ('0').

me1200ErpsConfigRowEditorGroupIndex.name: me1200ErpsConfigRowEditorGroupIndex
me1200ErpsConfigRowEditorGroupIndex.description: ERPS group index number. Valid range is (1..max groups). The maximum group number is platform-specific and can be retrieved from the ERPS capabilities.

me1200ErpsConfigRowEditorRingType.name: me1200ErpsConfigRowEditorRingType
me1200ErpsConfigRowEditorRingType.description: Type of ring. Can only be set once for a ring instance.

me1200ErpsConfigRowEditorPort0.name: me1200ErpsConfigRowEditorPort0
me1200ErpsConfigRowEditorPort0.description: ifindex of ring protection port 0. Can only be set once for a ring instance.

me1200ErpsConfigRowEditorPort1.name: me1200ErpsConfigRowEditorPort1
me1200ErpsConfigRowEditorPort1.description: ifindex of ring protection Port 1. For interconnected sub-rings this value must be zero. Can only be set once for a ring instance.

me1200ErpsConfigRowEditorInterconnectMaj.name: me1200ErpsConfigRowEditorInterconnectMajorRingGroupIndex
me1200ErpsConfigRowEditorInterconnectMaj.description: For sub-ring: zero = not interconnected; > zero = index of major ring group. For major ring: zero = not interconnected; > zero = is interconnected (i.e flag-like semantics). Can only be set once for a ring instance.

me1200ErpsConfigRowEditorVirtualChannel.name: me1200ErpsConfigRowEditorVirtualChannel
me1200ErpsConfigRowEditorVirtualChannel.description: Whether to use a virtual channel. Can only be set once for a ring instance.

me1200ErpsConfigRowEditorPort0SignalFail.name: me1200ErpsConfigRowEditorPort0SignalFailMepIndex
me1200ErpsConfigRowEditorPort0SignalFail.description: Index of SignalFail MEP for Port 0. Zero if not set. To clear an ERPS group's MEP association, set this to zero; it affects all MEP indices.

me1200ErpsConfigRowEditorPort0ApsMepInde.name: me1200ErpsConfigRowEditorPort0ApsMepIndex
me1200ErpsConfigRowEditorPort0ApsMepInde.description: Index of APS MEP for Port 0. Zero if not set.

me1200ErpsConfigRowEditorPort1SignalFail.name: me1200ErpsConfigRowEditorPort1SignalFailMepIndex
me1200ErpsConfigRowEditorPort1SignalFail.description: Index of SignalFail MEP for Port 1. Zero if not set. Must be zero for interconnected sub-rings.

me1200ErpsConfigRowEditorPort1ApsMepInde.name: me1200ErpsConfigRowEditorPort1ApsMepIndex
me1200ErpsConfigRowEditorPort1ApsMepInde.description: Index of APS MEP for Port 1. Zero if not set. Must be zero for interconnected sub-rings with virtual channel.

me1200ErpsConfigRowEditorHoldOffTime.name: me1200ErpsConfigRowEditorHoldOffTime
me1200ErpsConfigRowEditorHoldOffTime.description: Hold off time in ms. Value is rounded down to 100ms precision. Valid range is 0-10000 ms

me1200ErpsConfigRowEditorWaitToRestoreTi.name: me1200ErpsConfigRowEditorWaitToRestoreTime
me1200ErpsConfigRowEditorWaitToRestoreTi.description: Wait-to-Restore time in ms. Valid range is 60000-720000 ms (1-12 minutes).

me1200ErpsConfigRowEditorGuardTime.name: me1200ErpsConfigRowEditorGuardTime
me1200ErpsConfigRowEditorGuardTime.description: Guard time in ms. Valid range is 10-2000 ms.

me1200ErpsConfigRowEditorRplPort.name: me1200ErpsConfigRowEditorRplPort
me1200ErpsConfigRowEditorRplPort.description: RPL port. Only valid if the ERPS group is RPL owner or neighbour.

me1200ErpsConfigRowEditorTopologyChange.name: me1200ErpsConfigRowEditorTopologyChange
me1200ErpsConfigRowEditorTopologyChange.description: Whether to enable Topology Change propagation; only valid for an interconnected node.

me1200ErpsConfigRowEditorProtectedVlans0.name: me1200ErpsConfigRowEditorProtectedVlans0Kto1K
me1200ErpsConfigRowEditorProtectedVlans0.description: First quarter of bit-array indicating whether a VLAN is protected by this ring instance ('1') or not ('0').

me1200ErpsConfigRowEditorProtectedVlans1.name: me1200ErpsConfigRowEditorProtectedVlans1Kto2K
me1200ErpsConfigRowEditorProtectedVlans1.description: Second quarter of bit-array indicating whether a VLAN is protected by this ring instance ('1') or not ('0').

me1200ErpsConfigRowEditorProtectedVlans2.name: me1200ErpsConfigRowEditorProtectedVlans2Kto3K
me1200ErpsConfigRowEditorProtectedVlans2.description: Third quarter of bit-array indicating whether a VLAN is protected by this ring instance ('1') or not ('0').

me1200ErpsConfigRowEditorProtectedVlans3.name: me1200ErpsConfigRowEditorProtectedVlans3Kto4K
me1200ErpsConfigRowEditorProtectedVlans3.description: Fourth quarter of bit-array indicating whether a VLAN is protected by this ring instance ('1') or not ('0').

me1200ErpsStatusTable.name: me1200ErpsStatusTable
me1200ErpsStatusTable.description: This table contains status per EPRS group.

me1200ErpsStatusGroupIndex.name: me1200ErpsStatusGroupIndex
me1200ErpsStatusGroupIndex.description: ERPS group index number. Valid range is (1..max groups). The maximum group number is platform-specific and can be retrieved from the ERPS capabilities.

me1200ErpsStatusActive.name: me1200ErpsStatusActive
me1200ErpsStatusActive.description: Specifies whether ERPS group is currently active or not.

me1200ErpsStatusProtectionState.name: me1200ErpsStatusProtectionState
me1200ErpsStatusProtectionState.description: Specifies current ERPS group protection state.

me1200ErpsStatusRplBlocked.name: me1200ErpsStatusRplBlocked
me1200ErpsStatusRplBlocked.description: Specifies whether the RPL is currently blocked or not.

me1200ErpsStatusWtrRemaining.name: me1200ErpsStatusWtrRemaining
me1200ErpsStatusWtrRemaining.description: Specifies the remaining wait-time before restoring ring.

me1200ErpsStatusAdminCmd.name: me1200ErpsStatusAdminCmd
me1200ErpsStatusAdminCmd.description: Specifies the currently active administrative command.

me1200ErpsStatusFopAlarm.name: me1200ErpsStatusFopAlarm
me1200ErpsStatusFopAlarm.description: Specifies whether the FailureOfProtocol alarm is currently active or not.

me1200ErpsStatusTxActive.name: me1200ErpsStatusTxActive
me1200ErpsStatusTxActive.description: Specifies whether R-APS transmission is currently active.

me1200ErpsStatusTxRequestOrState.name: me1200ErpsStatusTxRequestOrState
me1200ErpsStatusTxRequestOrState.description: Specifies the currently transmitted request/state. Only relevant when Tx is active.

me1200ErpsStatusTxRplBlocked.name: me1200ErpsStatusTxRplBlocked
me1200ErpsStatusTxRplBlocked.description: Specifies the currently transmitted RPL Blocked flag. Only relevant when Tx is active.

me1200ErpsStatusTxDoNotFlush.name: me1200ErpsStatusTxDoNotFlush
me1200ErpsStatusTxDoNotFlush.description: Specifies the currently transmitted Do Not Flush flag. Only relevant when Tx is active.

me1200ErpsStatusBlockedPortReference.name: me1200ErpsStatusBlockedPortReference
me1200ErpsStatusBlockedPortReference.description: Specifies the currently transmitted Blocked Port Reference. Only relevant when Tx is active.

me1200ErpsStatusPort0Blocked.name: me1200ErpsStatusPort0Blocked
me1200ErpsStatusPort0Blocked.description: Specifies whether ring Port 0 is blocked or not.

me1200ErpsStatusPort0State.name: me1200ErpsStatusPort0State
me1200ErpsStatusPort0State.description: Specifies the state of ring Port 0.

me1200ErpsStatusPort0RxActive.name: me1200ErpsStatusPort0RxActive
me1200ErpsStatusPort0RxActive.description: Specifies if ring Port0 receives R-APS.

me1200ErpsStatusPort0RxRequestOrState.name: me1200ErpsStatusPort0RxRequestOrState
me1200ErpsStatusPort0RxRequestOrState.description: Specifies the most recently received request/state on ring Port 0. Only relevant when Rx is active.

me1200ErpsStatusPort0RxRplBlocked.name: me1200ErpsStatusPort0RxRplBlocked
me1200ErpsStatusPort0RxRplBlocked.description: Specifies the most recently received RPL Blocked flag on ring Port 0. Only relevant when Rx is active.

me1200ErpsStatusPort0RxDoNotFlush.name: me1200ErpsStatusPort0RxDoNotFlush
me1200ErpsStatusPort0RxDoNotFlush.description: Specifies the most recently received Do Not Flush flag on ring Port 0. Only relevant when Rx is active.

me1200ErpsStatusPort0RxBlockedPortRefere.name: me1200ErpsStatusPort0RxBlockedPortReference
me1200ErpsStatusPort0RxBlockedPortRefere.description: Specifies the most recently received Blocked Port Reference on ring Port 0. Only relevant when Rx is active.

me1200ErpsStatusPort0RxNodeId.name: me1200ErpsStatusPort0RxNodeId
me1200ErpsStatusPort0RxNodeId.description: Specifies the most recently received node ID on ring Port 0. Only relevant when Rx is active.

me1200ErpsStatusPort1Blocked.name: me1200ErpsStatusPort1Blocked
me1200ErpsStatusPort1Blocked.description: Specifies whether ring Port 1 is blocked or not.

me1200ErpsStatusPort1State.name: me1200ErpsStatusPort1State
me1200ErpsStatusPort1State.description: Specifies the state of ring Port 1.

me1200ErpsStatusPort1RxActive.name: me1200ErpsStatusPort1RxActive
me1200ErpsStatusPort1RxActive.description: Specifies if ring Port1 receives R-APS.

me1200ErpsStatusPort1RxRequestOrState.name: me1200ErpsStatusPort1RxRequestOrState
me1200ErpsStatusPort1RxRequestOrState.description: Specifies the most recently received request/state on ring Port 1. Only relevant when Rx is active.

me1200ErpsStatusPort1RxRplBlocked.name: me1200ErpsStatusPort1RxRplBlocked
me1200ErpsStatusPort1RxRplBlocked.description: Specifies the most recently received RPL Blocked flag on ring Port 1. Only relevant when Rx is active.

me1200ErpsStatusPort1RxDoNotFlush.name: me1200ErpsStatusPort1RxDoNotFlush
me1200ErpsStatusPort1RxDoNotFlush.description: Specifies the most recently received Do Not Flush flag on ring Port 1. Only relevant when Rx is active.

me1200ErpsStatusPort1RxBlockedPortRefere.name: me1200ErpsStatusPort1RxBlockedPortReference
me1200ErpsStatusPort1RxBlockedPortRefere.description: Specifies the most recently received Blocked Port Reference on ring Port 1. Only relevant when Rx is active.

me1200ErpsStatusPort1RxNodeId.name: me1200ErpsStatusPort1RxNodeId
me1200ErpsStatusPort1RxNodeId.description: Specifies the most recently received node ID on ring Port 1. Only relevant when Rx is active.

me1200ErpsStatisticsTable.name: me1200ErpsStatisticsTable
me1200ErpsStatisticsTable.description: This table contains statistics per EPRS group.

me1200ErpsStatisticsGroupIndex.name: me1200ErpsStatisticsGroupIndex
me1200ErpsStatisticsGroupIndex.description: ERPS group index number. Valid range is (1..max groups). The maximum group number is platform-specific and can be retrieved from the ERPS capabilities.

me1200ErpsStatisticsRapsRxDrop.name: me1200ErpsStatisticsRapsRxDrop
me1200ErpsStatisticsRapsRxDrop.description: Number of received RAPS PDUs that were dropped.

me1200ErpsStatisticsLocalSFCleared.name: me1200ErpsStatisticsLocalSFCleared
me1200ErpsStatisticsLocalSFCleared.description: Number of local SignalFail clear events.

me1200ErpsControlTable.name: me1200ErpsControlTable
me1200ErpsControlTable.description: This is the ERPS group control table.

me1200ErpsControlEntry.name: me1200ErpsControlEntry
me1200ErpsControlEntry.description: Each entry in this table represents dynamic control elements an ERPS group.

me1200ErpsControlGroupIndex.name: me1200ErpsControlGroupIndex
me1200ErpsControlGroupIndex.description: ERPS group index number. Valid range is (1..max groups). The maximum group number is platform-specific and can be retrieved from the ERPS capabilities.

me1200ErpsControlCommand.name: me1200ErpsControlCommand
me1200ErpsControlCommand.description: Control command to execute. Always returns none when read.

me1200ErpsControlPort.name: me1200ErpsControlPort
me1200ErpsControlPort.description: Ring port affected by control command. Only relevant for administrative commands. Always returns port0 when read.

me1200ErpsCapabilitiesInfoGroup.name: me1200ErpsCapabilitiesInfoGroup
me1200ErpsCapabilitiesInfoGroup.description: A collection of objects suitable for bulk operations.

me1200ErpsConfigTableInfoGroup.name: me1200ErpsConfigTableInfoGroup
me1200ErpsConfigTableInfoGroup.description: A collection of objects suitable for bulk operations.

me1200ErpsConfigRowEditorInfoGroup.name: me1200ErpsConfigRowEditorInfoGroup
me1200ErpsConfigRowEditorInfoGroup.description: A collection of objects suitable for bulk operations.

me1200ErpsStatusTableInfoGroup.name: me1200ErpsStatusTableInfoGroup
me1200ErpsStatusTableInfoGroup.description: A collection of objects suitable for bulk operations.

me1200ErpsStatisticsTableInfoGroup.name: me1200ErpsStatisticsTableInfoGroup
me1200ErpsStatisticsTableInfoGroup.description: A collection of objects suitable for bulk operations.

me1200ErpsControlTableInfoGroup.name: me1200ErpsControlTableInfoGroup
me1200ErpsControlTableInfoGroup.description: A collection of objects suitable for bulk operations.

me1200ErpsMibCompliance.name: me1200ErpsMibCompliance
me1200ErpsMibCompliance.description: The compliance statement for the implementation.
